storyInfo:
Lungmen, Ursus, Rhodes Island, all three are picking up the pieces. Things are far from over, but everything is at an end, for now.
Good night.

attributes.content: Damn it, Amiya!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ah...! What happened, Amiya?!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.options: What's going on?;How did...?;Kal'tsit, do something!

attributes.content: ...Come here, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What I'm about to do next, you are not to tell anyone, ever.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Superintendent Ch'en of Lungmen!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No longer.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Then I'll ask you to keep an eye on the dragon over there for me. We'll be taking her into custody when this is all over. Any questions?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Look after Amiya first.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Yes. Doctor, give me your hand.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Okay!;(Stretch out your arm);You'd just grab it anyway if I tried to back away, wouldn't you?

attributes.content: *Sigh*. This isn't going to hurt. But, don't ask.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'm going to jam this syringe into your arm and take some blood. And that's all I'm telling you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It's for your own good.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No questions.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She's right, it doesn't hurt. You don't feel anything.
Kal'tsit places your freshly drawn blood into a device on her waist. Seconds later, she administers a blue solution into Amiya's neck.
Amiya's breathing stabilizes.
It worked. Amiya... wake up.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Huh... Miss... Miss Theresa...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...No. It's me, Amiya.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit... I...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You're okay, Amiya. You don't have to talk. Let's get ready to go. It's all okay now.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hm.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: *whine*...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Wah... Aahh.... Waaahhh...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Why are you crying?;Amiya...;(Silently stay with her)

attributes.content: Waaahhh... Doctor... Waaaaahh...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Um... Mm...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hm.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...My tears... Doctor, I managed not to cry until the end... I... I promised... I... I...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Doctor... Doctor...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Dr. {@nickname}...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ch'en, the aircraft will reach the control tower momentarily. We'll take Talulah and go.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Are you sure? I haven't... even decided how to handle her.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: We need Talulah. Rhodes Island must take her first.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: That's going to bring trouble!;......;The crazy shit you say doesn't even surprise me anymore.

attributes.content: Are you worried we're going to get ourselves killed?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No need, Dr. {@nickname}, that ship has long since sailed. It sailed as soon as we got involved here.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We have two swords hanging over our heads: one is Lungmen's and one belongs to the Third Army of Ursus.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We stopped the core city, we got involved in the attack on Lungmen, and we know the entire conspiracy. That's enough to have them plotting to destroy us.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What would the Third Army do if Lungmen decided to strike at us?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: They'd grab the popcorn.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The murderers in their fancy uniforms would watch our landship burn into a scorched hulk in the wastelands, one of the thorns in their side melting away.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And on the other side, a private company without registration in Lungmen, not under the protection of Lungmen, finds itself attacked and destroyed by unknown forces.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That doesn't sound like a problem for Lungmen or Yan, does it?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Unless, of course, we're holding Talulah.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Anyone who might want to strike at us first needs to consider the signal they're sending. Does it say to their rivals that they need Talulah? That she's key to this case?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That she grants an advantage, that she could eliminate a weakness?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That is our one and only chance at survival.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It is to Rhodes Island's great advantage that the magnates of Lungmen and the ancient nobility of Ursus will not find common ground in the next century.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If we hold Talulah, their hands are tied. Neither will want to make the first move.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Neither will want to risk the evidence vital to both sides. Their best course of action will be to remain at a safe distance. Both parties want to distance themselves from this smoking gun.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It would take only one slight misstep to bring ruin to either the Third Army or Lungmen. Neither has the authority to stand for their entire country.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Third Army tried, once. And they will pay a terrible price for the mistake. The stakes are too high.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: So we will seize the advantage in this situation. We will use each side to protect ourselves from the other.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Talulah is vital to our survival. At least for now.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Those clever enough to survive will find a balancing point, and with Talulah in our hands, Rhodes Island can actively choose to be that very point.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: At least until this all blows over, or they're swept up in the next storm.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: I won't be able to convince you.;......;You planned this from the start, didn't you?

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: There's the aircraft. Time to go. Get Talulah and Amiya in first.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We'll take the next one.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: There's no point in fighting any more. The guerrillas are gonna kill us.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Fall back! Abandon the city! We lost! It's over.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Says who?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You're alive...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: If I went down that easy, I couldn't ask you to come with me.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Why? Why should we follow you?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Hah. Need me to spell it out for you? You're free, ya goof.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...Huh? Free? What are you talking about?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: You don't have to kill for anybody anymore. And it's not like I'm your boss now either, I'm just saying you can tag along with me.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You're done being hired muscle. Now you fight for yourselves! Oh, but still, you can't just be killing for fun. I'll blow your ribcage open if you do.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: What I'm getting at is we don't have to listen to the bitches who just want our blades and bows. The ones who don't care if we die, as long as we take a bunch of lives with us.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: But me? I'm built different. I appreciate money, and they gave us lots.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: The thing is, we're still alive, and we can get more of it. Don't need to go piling up cash on gravestones.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: See some haters? Kill 'em. Kill anybody who looks at us the wrong way. Kill anybody who wants to hurt us. Just wipe 'em all out.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Not for Reunion, not for all the devils, not for anybody.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: We make our own way in the world. Maybe we wanna go to Yan and learn how to play Go. Doesn't matter. It's all good.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You in?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Not like there's anywhere else to go.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: We'll follow you. But no tricks, W.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Sorry, man. All I got is tricks.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Is it over?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Looks good. I'm really glad we didn't have to pretend to be anyone's friend in order to kill them.
attributes.name: Hawk

attributes.content: I never thought the plan would flip around to helping Reunion like this...
attributes.name: Hawk

attributes.content: Thanks, bro! Nice work! Let's get out of here!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: (Ursine) Don't mention it!
attributes.name: Hawk

attributes.content: Now we're their accomplices.
attributes.name: Hawk

attributes.content: Hawk, how about a coffee when we get back? I'll tell you about that op back in Columbia...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I was on your team.
attributes.name: Hawk

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Don't you remember your squadmates?
attributes.name: Hawk

attributes.content: Well you were never there for any of the missions.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Well then... We might've really done some good this time.
attributes.name: Hawk

attributes.content: Just a minute, kitten. Is that your aircraft? What's it doing?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Oh, I know...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: It must be here to take Talulah. Ah, there it goes... we already have her.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: What? You took Talulah?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: No, we can't allow that! Rhodes doesn't have the right!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: She must stand trial! She can't just walk away!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Sorry... this is how it is.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: You want revenge, but you can't have it.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: We can't put her on trial.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: But you're taking her from us. You stole our chance to execute her!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Kitten, don't be so quick to show off what you've learned...
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Hatred runs in our veins. The hatred of Reunion and all the Infected brothers Talulah killed fills us with the rage that gives us the right to try her.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Only us. No one else.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Will you give her a fair trial?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: We are justice. Talulah can't escape us.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Okay then, Mister. I'll make you a promise. We won't hand Talulah over to anyone but you and Reunion.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: What are you going to do with her?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Even I don't know. But I can make you that promise.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Because I know we're doing what's right.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Kill me now if you have to. I believe in Rhodes Island. I'll stand in for her.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: What are you talking about?! Don't talk like that.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Look, kitten, if you think there's any difference between your loyalty and ours, you've got another thing coming. I Trust you. You'll be a glorious fighter someday.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Go on! For you, I'll trust Rhodes Island, just this once.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: But you remember. I don't care if it's Talulah or the Lord of Fiends... if I hear you've stepped out of line even just once...
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: If I hear you've done harm to the downtrodden people of this world, we will hunt you down, we will strike you, and we will kill you all.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Especially Talulah. Don't use her for evil.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: We'll spike their heads on the highest point in the city, to honor the Captain, our great warrior, who died here alone.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: This isn't how his story was supposed to end.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: It won't come to that. Rhodes Island wouldn't do that. Even if they tried, I wouldn't let them.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Someday... I'll be just like you said. I'll be able to pick out who's good and who's bad.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: No one should suffer the loss of a loved one. I'll do what's right. I'll be the judge.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I think I almost have my own standard.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: We believe in you. We believe your promise, kitten! Young as you are, you're a lot stronger than so many spineless grown-ups.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Alright, we'll hold off on destroying Rhodes Island for now. Because you're there.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Pinky swear?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Huh? Haha, okay. Pinky swear.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Hm.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: If I had a daughter, she'd be about your age.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Kitten, the other girl, the Lord of Fiends... the Cautus. If she can really keep doing good...
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: You can count on us. If you ever get into trouble, we'll be there. Because the Captain... the Captain and Yelena... they chose her..
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: I hope you'll prove right. I hope we're wrong.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: But that's not how it'll go. Because we're doing the right thing.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Time to go.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Rosmontis! Thank you, Reunion fighters.... We have to go.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: We're not Reunion anymore.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Goodbye, kitten. Hurry on home.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Bye bye, Mister.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Bye!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: They're gone, brothers.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: But we can't. We have unfinished business.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Nothing from the leader of Reunion.
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: Chernobog's core city has stopped moving. Tell the Sixth, Seventh, and Twelfth Divisions, if they still want to proceed, we'll need...
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: Stop.
Or we will be forced to stop you.
Not that we would be able to, even if we tried.
Only you can put a stop to your nonsensical war machine in time.
You cannot resist the blade of Ursus. Not this time.
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: And you, the pawns of an incapable lord, who are you to give orders to us?
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: (Gaulish) And how do you know you are not under the spell of Kashchey?
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: Never speak that language to me again! The age of Gaul is over!
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: Never again will that language be used to communicate between countries! Not a city of theirs remains!
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: Kashchey is determined, a determined champion of Ursus!
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: You cut down the last man so praised by the people of Ursus.
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: You need not be so overly prudent. We can offer you assistance. There are things only you may do.
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: You would ask us to betray our country?
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: Young one... As I see it, you commit treason in proceeding with this plan of yours. What happens next is up to you, but it is Ursus who will suffer the consequences.
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: Having done all this, you must know: the nobles started this war to solve a problem, but war is far, far worse than the problem.
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: Where is it you will find ultimate peace in Ursus?
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: You put an end to that era by your own hands. You know it better than we.
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: Wei Yenwu's minions. How did you find us?
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: By our own effort. You have a lot to learn.
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: Are you threatening me?
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: No. Only... we have aged.
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: And while you boast of loyalty to your homeland...
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: There are some matters, however loyal you may view them... in which we will play no part.
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: What are you talking about?
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: That which we will not do.
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: (Gaulish) Let's take a step back, young one.
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: The Royal Guard has fresh blood. You have more life ahead of you than we. If this is wrong, you will have time to right it.
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: But you must think of Ursus, so as to avoid the same pitfalls.
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: Who will right it?
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: We will. You put a stop to your people.
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: And you, old men... You're not in the Imperial Guard anymore. Don't interfere.
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: Indeed, it has been a long, long time since we last were. Such is why we may speak freely. Long life to you, young one.
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: There will not be a next time.
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: Please... I'm begging you!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: If you're going to kill me, just do it!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Just don't let them find me! They'll torture us... they always...
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Enough gossip.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Move out! Come on, we don't want...
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: The Shieldguards to get you.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Are you... you really letting us go?
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: The captain would want you to live. Confusing one, that.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: You stay away from them. Talulah's guards and the Shieldguards.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Confusing one.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: You sure you want to stay?
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: But Reunion is gone...
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: I think you can't even call the Shieldguards Reunion anymore.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: They sure don't call themselves that.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Unless... unless we were going to make some changes.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: If we're Reunion, we have to change ourselves.
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: You still believe that?
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: I know we Infected can pull ourselves up when we fall.
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Over the next thirty-six hours, the soldiers from Ursus's Third Army who had infiltrated the Chernobog core city quietly vanished.
Of course, no one could prove they were Ursus soldiers.
Before leaving the core city, the Shieldguards found Reunion corpses with no identifying items, except for the wounds in their flesh...
They were all caused by the same thrown weapon.
The formless killers planned to kill the heavies they knew, sending a quiet warning to the unseen parties who were not present.
Of course, the Shieldguards were more direct with their message. Traitors drown in their own blood.
A joint investigation team from Yan and Ursus submitted their reports two weeks after arriving in Chernobog.
They were clear: there was zero evidence that either of the two countries had anything to do with the tragedy.
They determined that the Chernobog Incident was created and caused by the Infected.

But the vagaries of political conflict meant that any further legal action to be taken against the Infected that might have been circulating in the major cities ultimately died in various legislatures, piles of unpassable bills...
Until finally meeting an unceremonious end in the old secretary's crank shredder during a cleanup.
Thus, the Chernobog Incident silently drew to a close.
Calm down.
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: I'm not a killer. Go this way. You can't stay here! If the Ursus Army finds you, they won't care if you're Infected or not. They're wiping out the city.
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: So you're the only one we can trust?
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: If you want to live... you'll live.
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: We'll live. Where should we go?
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: ...Alright. Sure. This way.
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: I can't do anything about you hating us. But I hope we won't have any more hate for you, since you also lost your homes.
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Brothers! Here. Take them. They're not Infected, so be careful.
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Crownslayer? What about you?!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Where are you going...? What should we do?
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Why are you still following me?
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: You're a leader of Reunion...
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: I'm nothing.
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: I want to go back to Siracusa.
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Why? Why would you...?
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: I'm weak. I need to get stronger.
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Back when I was leaving Siracusa to go to Ursus, to take revenge for my father, my teacher stopped me. Saying I was weak, and I couldn't do it.
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: I didn't believe it. But it was the truth.
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: My brain doesn't work like Talulah's. I'm not as skilled as my teacher. I'm weak.
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Even the cause I believed in... was just somebody's tool. You all know, right? Talulah betrayed us. No matter what the deal is, Reunion is over.
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: I don't think this is how the movement ends.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Aren't you from Lungmen?
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Yes. But where I come from doesn't matter to what I'm saying.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Whether or not she acknowledges it, and you have to realize it... No matter what happens to Reunion, Talulah already lit the flame.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: And you can't just put it out like this.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Sure. If that's how it is, I think they're better off going with you.
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Are you asking that of me?
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Let's say I'm entrusting them to you. You might be lying to me here, but these people lost their homes. I won't lie to you.
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: They'll be worse off with me.
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Okay, are you willing to come with me?
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: ...Crownslayer...
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Ursus... us... Ursus.
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: The Empire just hasn't gotten to the point where they'll treat all the Ursus like we do.
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Goodbye, all of you. Don't make the same mistakes I did.
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Girl...
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: What's your name? And where are you going?
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Call me 'Nine.'
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: I'm going to where the fire burns the hottest.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: I knew you'd be here.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Can't hide from you.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: You came here to mourn them.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I may be mourning us. Or reflecting on mortality and greed.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Your sword says something else.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: At least my sword isn't cutting your throat.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I know you don't mean it, Old Wei. If we were really going at it, who can say which one of us would drop first?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Be serious please.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I have to give you a few good jabs, old friend. You know, Hui-chieh and those Infected got it done.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You should think things over again, the arbitrary way you go about them. You almost dragged Lungmen into a war and wrecked the whole place.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I'm not sure about that. Even if Lungmen were to choose a certain future, it may yet choke it out over some small thing. A chance occurrence.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: The city didn't choose her. We should be proud that she chose the city.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: They're not mutually exclusive, Kojui. The city chose her too.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Even if it wasn't ready to accept who she is...
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: And you should tell that to her. It's time for me to go, Old Wei.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Wait, Kojui!
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Did the Shadow Guard lie to me?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: They're your Shadow Guard, how should I know?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I should've known you and Lin Yuhsia were working together.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Your Shadow Guard aren't the Imperial Guards they once were. They're human now.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Do you think they can stand to watch you make another mistake?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: So that means... when I told them to handle the Infected, then you...
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Shh. Heaven knows. Besides, when you knew we would
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Head back soon. That sick old tiger has something for you.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Hui-chieh?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Oh, you're here.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Uncle Lin.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Look at you, dressed like this, it looks like you're headed right off somewhere.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Do remember to visit from time to time.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I'm not sure I can.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Then you'll have to write us, let us know you're safe out there.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I will, Uncle Lin.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: This is where Talulah's father is buried... And your mother.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: In the end, they couldn't be buried in the city they loved. Or, in the case of your mother, it was a matter of both love and hate.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I'll never forget the look of this place, Hui-chieh. I think of them whenever I see it... my sister, and my sworn brother, with whom I shared no blood.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: They are buried here.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: A place too small to house their passion, words too weak to express their remorse.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: An unmarked grave.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Yes. Heh... names perhaps mean more to the living.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: All around the world, we idealize burial, as all graves eventually disappear. No one knows a peaceful, eternal sleep.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Catastrophe, war, abandonment, and all such things. Should a city disappear, the souls buried within disappear right along with it.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: And in the countless settlements that dot the land, I have never yet found one where the descendants knew the location of the graves of their ancestors.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: There is a form of burial called the Tombway, it denotes a part of a nomadic city's pathing as the burial ground, where the dead will be tossed from the city, with the passing cycle as a form of honor.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I'm too forgetful. Too many things I forget too easily, too many things I want so desperately to forget.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: But dare not ever forget them.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: And so... I picked this place for them.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I brought my sister to Lungmen, I met Fumizuki in Lungmen, along with Edward, who had fled to Lungmen.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I can't say we made the best of friends, but he was smart, and bold.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Kashchey ruled Lungmen from the shadows, and saw us as thorns in his side. We knew we had no choice but to depose him... it was the only way to give us a future in the city.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Here, this grave, is the farthest Lungmen had ever been.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: After we beat Kashchey and exiled him from Lungmen, the city sat a few dozen miles away, bright, and full of hope. Our future awaited us.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: We drank, talked, laughed, enjoyed ourselves without a thought to our remaining fuel.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: We very nearly died of thirst until Adams, that sick old tiger, coughed up his car to come get us. Boy did he give Edward and I the business after that.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Oh... he wasn't as old then. Nor was he as sick, or ferocious.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: But who cares? We were all having a good time.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Lin was laughing... laughing like we didn't have blood on our hands... laughing like we were boys in the time of our lives.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Edward was the scion of the highest Londinium nobility. And we were keeping that secret in Lungmen. But Kashchey already knew, he may have long since started plotting.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: He told my jealous twin and the Shadow of Londinium about Edward and my sister... about their relationship...
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I was forced to choose between Edward or my sister's unborn child.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I hid it for ten years after Edward died. Only my brother and Kashchey knew. But now, Edward and my sister are both gone from this world.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Someday, a Catastrophe will strike and wipe away everything. No one will remember the tragic lovers buried here. These two, who died because of me, will be forgotten.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I met 'Kashchey.' He may be more evil than either of us know.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I can imagine.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: This grave...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: ...Mother.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It was my fault your mother wasn't so warm towards you. I had to have her marry that Yan noble, to protect her. I should have done better.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: It's all in the past.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Promise me, Wei Yenwu. Promise me you won't let Lungmen turn into a grave.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Never again.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: As if I could trust a word you say.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I never needed your trust. Hmph... But, you can believe me this one time. Like when I promised to train you.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: You trained me well. I couldn't have gotten her back without you.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'm glad.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I don't think you've spoken to me in ten years as much as you did today.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I think we talked a lot?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: What I mean is as Ch'en Hui-chieh. Not as Superintendent Ch'en.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Haha.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I'll be off.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What are you planning to do with your sister?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I have no feelings for Talulah anymore. Except guilt.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Good. That's what you should feel.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: We're one pair of the countless separated siblings in this world. Most will never be reunited.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Even so, I can't just let her go. I still don't know what she is, it's still not clear.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: There's a prison to keep criminals, but Lungmen we know today can't hold her.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I can't make the Lungmen that could. Only you can create an L.G.D. that could keep the Infected and the uninfected together.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: It doesn't have to be me. We all have our own part to play.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I know that truth, no matter how correct it might be. If the people of Lungmen don't accept it, then they won't. I've seen too much of the slums.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: And if it is possible to build something like that, I'd like to do it with Rhodes Island first.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Talulah... no matter how long it takes, I will get her a fair trial.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You really have grown up.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I don't need to hear that from you, Sir. I don't think it's a good thing.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: If I, on behalf of Lungmen, ask you to stay, will you do it?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Hah.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: If you and Talulah ever wanted to come back, Lungmen would make the move to take you back, if it can.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: There are so many things we can't do. But maybe them, in the future, maybe they could.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I just hope you haven't forgotten what you were reflecting on. That would be good enough.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Say hello to Aunt Fumizuki for me.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Err...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Uncle...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Take care of yourself.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hui-chieh!
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Ch'en stops for a moment, but she does not turn back.
What is it?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The path before you is long and hard. But I know you will master it.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I'll bear that in mind.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Right then. What's the second condition you wanted to offer Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: After using them to wipe out Reunion, I would ask them to take as many of Lungmen's Infected as they could.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Give them land, resources, funding, and all the materials they need.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: They can't refuse. Even if they know this is a hard pill to swallow.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I have done this before, and I will continue to do it.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: No hesitation, no regret.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: And for now?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: *Sigh*. The situation has changed. And we must change with it.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Is there a problem with you thanking them directly?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: You don't worry so much about winning and losing as you used to. And I think I can guess the reason.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: It's about our little Ch'en.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: That's why things have changed?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Lungmen's Infected belong in Lungmen.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: So what about Ch'en?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: She has her own path to walk.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Will you visit her?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: The Chief of Lungmen can't have anything to do with an Infected organization.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Hmph. Harsh.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Then I'll go.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Well... say hello to her for me.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: When forced to choose between my sister and my sworn brother, I chose my sister. I vowed to let no harm come to them, but...
I broke that vow.
This time is different. I will never choose again.
Kashchey was wrong. I had no choice. Wei Yenwu, you have only one path to walk, in fact.
Even if it is the path of fratricide.
For the sake of my two nieces, for the sake of the Lungmen in my dreams. Even if it is my one and only path.
(Hui-chieh... live well.)
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: A few weeks later...
Attention, honored Rhodes Island operators, this is Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Thanks to our efforts, the Chernobog issue has been resolved peacefully.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Does it hurt?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Ow... Only if you poke it!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Oh. Sorry.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: It's fine... how are you?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Fine.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Ehwhaaa? No way, little kitten... since when do you keep things to yourself?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Is that bad...?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Oh, of course not! Scout, can you see? Our little kitten is all grown up! She's a big girl!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: She's so big now... waaaahhhh...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: D-Don't cry... I want to forget!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: You're really crying? Why are you crying?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Waaaahhhh...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: D-Don't cry, Blaze... don't...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Bluishsilver should know... Ace too... our kitten... she's grown up...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: ...Blaze...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Waaaaaaahhhhh!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hey!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Much of the truth will stay buried forever in the ruins of Chernobog.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Because we live in an uncaring world.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But Rhodes Island will remember. No matter what else we undertake... we must remember.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: A Rhodes Operator does not sacrifice her life for a single person or event.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Oh, this topical medicine is really useful!
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: There are lots of similar patents out there, but I think this cream is effective enough to have a market.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: The main point is that even if it's not especially effective, it is very cheap to produce... all the components that came up in analysis were common, wild-growing plants.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: It's a bit of a pain to get them from the northwest tundra, they're spread over such a wide area.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: The inventor must've had more perseverance than medical knowledge.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: Where do you want to apply for the patent, Amiya?
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: In Ursus. And make it cheap.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But I think the Empire has similar tech?
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: Ursus has more people who need it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What should we name it then?
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: We'll call it... FrostNova.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Amiya? Were you looking for me?

attributes.content: Oh, Dr. {@nickname}!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Medic, you and Warfarin take care of it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We'll take it from here!
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: Doctor, I'm coming!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It is not for the results that we commit to what we do.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We do something not because we want to see it done.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: As a business, this may be a foolish strategy. But we live for more than material gain.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Our brave operators have proved that life, and its value, lay not only in ensuring the survival of one or even many people, or in its biological definition...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We have to live on in the moral, civilized sense. Because the future of life needs support, and Rhodes Island is that support.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We are fighting for a cause that will heal the scars on our world.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Another mission?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Yes. With Meteorite.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Care to bring a greenie? I have some new recruits who need to learn.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Oh? I don't think so. This is going to be a tough one.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Jessica and FrostLeaf are going out on patrol. They might be in a better place to take a recruit.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Jessica? Can she handle it?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: I think you've seen how far she's come.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: I have. I think she'll certainly be able to put some pressure on the new recruits.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Then Nearl is going to crush me with all her pressure.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: ...I... am I really that heavy?
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: No, that's not what I meant. *Sigh*.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: It is for this belief that we are willing to die.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ace Squad, thirteen members. Ace, Bad Tom, Kerg, Hard Brick
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: WoodsPoon, Seventeen, Bronze Nose, Green Pea, Lunar Silver, Confidenty, Sandwash, Violet Flame, and Caries.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Amiya Squad, thirteen members. Dim Needle, B-Softhand, ChiliJimme, KeenEar.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: AngerNeighing, Sunty, Marco Smith, Fade.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Divides, FrostNova, Antonio Lisa, Wildash, Hui, and Indigo Jade.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I can't put FrostNova on the KIA list.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No matter what you say, she wasn't an official employee.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What of the consequences? What if our operators are outraged at you putting a Reunion operative on our casualty list? It's not something you should do.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: She fought for the same goal.

attributes.content: Is that all it takes?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Rhodes Island fights for the same idea.

attributes.content: Okay...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'll do it. You've done your duty.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I hope you'll stay as you are now.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And I'd like to apologize for that thing back there, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The question you asked me back by the sarcophagus. I can't give you an answer. Not now, not tomorrow, not ever.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I don't want to hide the truth, but I really can't give you the answer you're looking for, unfortunately. Neither I nor PRTS have a good explanation. I hope you can forgive us.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But someday, when the time is right, it will appear to you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Doctor...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: When that day comes. When you finally know the truth. Will you be ready?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Another thing, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Amiya has taken on a lot of burdens. I hope you could... avoid giving her more bad memories.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We should take more onto ourselves instead, those things which we can't even face ourselves. We can do it.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: As long as you're here. As long as you are like this.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Scout Squad. Thirteen members. Scout, Milim, Tipsy...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Slink, Mimi, Leafa, Slanna, Mary...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Thumbtack, Mudflower, Macron, Pter, Scorpion.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Rosmontis Squad, one member, Bluishsilver. Raidian Squad, one member, Liqusa.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Forty-one sacrifices in all, in the Chernobog Incident.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Rhodes Island will not forget. We will remember their names forever.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Even should Rhodes Island cease to exist someday, all that they have done will leave its mark on our world.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Doctor...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You don't want to talk?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I get it. So much has happened.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But, with you by my side, I feel... I feel happy.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There are some things we can't do by ourselves.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: But it's not like we do them for their own sake.

attributes.content: Right!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Rhodes Island... we always press forward, no matter what the dark clouds bring.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And no matter how many terrible stories unfold across the world...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'll always believe in the warmth in your heart.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: That's a given.;......;What will you do if I'm actually bad?

attributes.content: Welcome home, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Then I'll have to stop you myself.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Welcome home, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Did she say anything?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Nope. Not a peep since you brought her in.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: She's so calm. Even when, uh... Ch'en, was it? Even when Ch'en came to see her, she didn't say anything.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: So what are you going to do about it?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Me? Do I look like Ascalon...? And I don't think we have anything we need from her yet anyway.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: More information is gonna depend on where you use it, I guess. I really don't know how to handle a person like that.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: What about those L.G.D. people?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: What? It's not like it's your first time at Rhodes Island. What's there to be shy about?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I just got promoted. I don't want anyone thinking I'm working under the table with Rhodes.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Missy, you're totally good with it, huh? You make it look like you're going shopping.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Who could stop me?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Sure enough. You got that rich girl brain.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Hmm...? Chief Wei's office. Who's... that?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: ...An angel with blue hair? Or a Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Woah! She's really hurt!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Hey! You can't just barge in... Chief Wei is in there.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Looks like you got company, Chief.
Anyone who could make their way in here is someone I can trust. Let's have you look after your own wounds first.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: If you don't mind letting those two out there eavesdrop, then this little scratch is no big deal.
What are you doing here, Laterano Messenger?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I'm not here as an official Laterano Messenger...
(Although, the Church does actually have a message for you.)
Hoshiguma! Take Swire outside.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Oh, roger that!
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Hey! Why just me...?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: There.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Speak, Messenger.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: ...He said... (Laterano language).
'What did you have for breakfast? And what will you eat for dinner?'
...Odd. Why would he want to know what I think?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I think... You are the Chief, Mr. Wei.
They're not here in an official capacity. The blonde tiger and the green-haired Oni... I think they're probably here to meet an old friend or something?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: But hey, if we carry on like this, we could have the Ursus Royal Guard taking a stroll around the landship.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: When they came by, did the... patient, react at all?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Nope.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I can only ever guess at what Kal'tsit's thinking. Oh, I'll get the surveillance set up, you stand under that camera. C'mon, c'mon~
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Talulah.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Humans are weak, complicated, selfish creatures.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Even cystybeasts possess a nobility human beings lack. They forage the land day after day, never stopping, never giving up.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Unlike humans.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Humans kill one another for food. Humans harm one another for selfish desires.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: As such, human beings use others to determine their own value, to measure their worth. You have what it takes to enlighten them them, you have the right to use them.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: You know what you must do. I taught you all that you are... How do you overcome these countless years of oppressive history? The history of humanity is a history of struggle.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Wisdom, ideals, and methods... Your sight is my sight. Surrender your fantasies. Sooner or later, you will return to me.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: I am your only end.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Kashchey... No, Kashchey. Absolutely not.
All that you taught me now weighs on my body, carved into it as scars forever. The past is behind us.
It's all... over.
Indeed... I must put an end to all you have brought.
All the ugliness and shame you cast upon me... will be my fuel. It will fuel my future.
Until I find you, until this world is liberated, I will never stop burning.
I will not deny you again, Kashchey. I oppose you.
Until all the wrongs have been righted and all our sins purged.
It will be done. Even if our end is the same, I will burn it all to ashes. Even if I burn to death.
How long have you been out?
Oh, I can't be bothered to count. I lost track a while ago.
But even if you run, you won't get away.
One needs a hammer to strike a nail. And if all you have is a hammer, everything looks like a nail.
Maybe now is the time.
Vina! Come here, please. I have words for you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Alright, Dr. Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Just a moment. One question. Are you ready?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'm not sure. But I guess I'm ready whenever.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Your Majesty...
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: Here is the completed report on the incident.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: How did this happen?
attributes.name: Fyodor

attributes.content: Did one of the Royal Guards betray us?
attributes.name: Fyodor

attributes.content: Witte, give me an honest answer.
attributes.name: Fyodor

attributes.content: My chest is an unlit fireplace on a winter day. Only honest words will get my heart beating again, whether or not an unpleasant truth may break it.
attributes.name: Fyodor

attributes.content: No. Your Royal Guards would never betray Your Majesty. They will remain loyal to you until the world itself is consumed by fire, as long as you are the rightful Emperor of Ursus.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: You and I both know those are but empty words. Would that the Guard did more than stand back and watch the old monster die...
attributes.name: Fyodor

attributes.content: Enough! No more platitudes, no more masks, I've grown weary! Witte, you are no fool. Tell me your thoughts! And look me in the eye as you do!
attributes.name: Fyodor

attributes.content: Where are the puppetmasters behind this plot?
attributes.name: Fyodor

attributes.content: Grand Duke Baikal, Deputy Marshal of the Third Army and Governor General Rosin, and Viscount Kerque.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: Of course, I still lack the evidence to prove that they actually orchestrated the entire ordeal.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: Further, when the Royal Guard went to hang them all in their homes. They found...
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: These traitors, lacking the courage to face their crimes and your wrath, they took their own lives rather than bear their due punishment.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: Cowards... absolute cowards! Have they not even the meager courage it takes to stand trial?
attributes.name: Fyodor

attributes.content: They must have known! They knew that a trial would reveal their base desires, their corrupted minds, to all the people of Ursus!
attributes.name: Fyodor

attributes.content: And yet... now we will never bring them to trial.
attributes.name: Fyodor

attributes.content: True, Your Majesty. How regrettable that we must now keep this knowledge behind the curtain, rather than take it out onto the stage.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: Even a stupid burdenbeast will do more than chew grass when roused.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: Nevertheless, the Royal Guard disposed of their remains in the proper manner.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: Their rotten corpses will dangle, stinking from the ceiling. No one will dare take them down.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: Had their conspiracy succeeded, Ursus would have suffered another war, they would have seen their influence increase, proportionally draining the power of the Council... perhaps further degrading our cities.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: We are most fortunate they failed.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: Traitors! Death was too good for them. I should feed them to the Flesh Buthidas!
attributes.name: Fyodor

attributes.content: But... that would be a terrible thing. No. We can't do that.
attributes.name: Fyodor

attributes.content: Pardon me, Witte. I didn't mean to lash out like that.
attributes.name: Fyodor

attributes.content: We must not go back down the road of ruin. No matter how much rage I have for my enemies, I cannot exhibit such behavior.
attributes.name: Fyodor

attributes.content: You did not resort to them during the Great Rebellion. To this day, I feel that only a proper, blood-soaked threat would have stirred them.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: Pure terror is the only language those who terrorize the innocent can understand.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: Although I am personally opposed to such measures.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: Unfathomable.
attributes.name: Fyodor

attributes.content: Must I resort to such ancient brutality, such poisonous traditions to stand against the ignorant?
attributes.name: Fyodor

attributes.content: And as these maggots seize the swords and shields of our empire, are even we left to naught but rot?
attributes.name: Fyodor

attributes.content: Forgive me, Your Majesty. I do not have an answer to that question. From a constitutional perspective, I am not your legal spymaster.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: More importantly, Witte, is the legend true? Is the 'Deathless Black Snake' a malignant deity that cannot be slain?
attributes.name: Fyodor

attributes.content: And are there other such deities like it in our realm? What can we do to free our people from this tyranny?
attributes.name: Fyodor

attributes.content: Witte, we stand now in the light... surrounded by darkness! Can we use fire to illuminate Ursus?
attributes.name: Fyodor

attributes.content: Your Majesty, I must point to one fact. In recent decades, only the Duke of Kashchey, among all the Ageless, shows clear signs of involvement in these events.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: And even after his death, we are unable to confirm her identity.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: That tells us that the Ageless of Ursus... still fear you.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: They fear you and your contempt.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: Nearly a thousand years have passed since we overthrew the Hippogryph. A couple of dying monsters cannot stand against the might of the Ursus people.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: Let them do as they will. They will fail.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: We will find them, and we will destroy them. Your Majesty need not worry.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: I hope it all proceeds as you've said.
attributes.name: Fyodor

attributes.content: What of the Infected situation? Any developments?
attributes.name: Fyodor

attributes.content: Your Majesty is overhasty. You acted too quickly to close the Infected mines the armies held in the northwest.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: It may have been your hope to weaken the Army's supply reserves, or even show a little benevolence
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: But as much as the Army opposes you, your people also oppose this. They fear the Infected.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: It is unwise to go against your people, at this juncture. They by and large despise the Infected, and standing against the Army here could be seen as you standing against the people.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: You lack the resources to pursue this course.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: Even if it's the right thing to do?
attributes.name: Fyodor

attributes.content: Even if it's the right thing to do. This is to show leniency to the Infected by shoveling them into the jaws of hell.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: It is time, Your Majesty. Yurodstvo has been waiting at the door for over fifteen minutes. I think you may want to see to him.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: Hmph. Raving lunatic with his holy visions! I'll make a proper joke of him.
attributes.name: Fyodor

attributes.content: But before that, Witte, do you think we can do it? Can we make Ursus great again?
attributes.name: Fyodor

attributes.content: I don't know, Your Majesty. Now is not an appropriate time to answer you.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: But at least you do not lay waste to the world as your father did. That is already quite good.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: Talulah the Infected... hm.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: Should you break the curse of the Deathless Black Snake, then you should be able to break through everything that weighs upon you.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: I hope that one day we have a real chance to defeat the country of the last emperor.
attributes.name: Islam Witte

attributes.content: Talulah?
You're doing a good service, standing guard in this weather.
I know it is what you want.
So you do. Until we walk out of this winter, my fire will keep burning.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: (Sh. Quiet...)
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: (They're sleeping.)
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: (Oh, sorry. Shh.)
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: (They trained all day?)
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: (The kid with the dark hair looks like he could handle a bow.)
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: (But he'll need to grow a bit.)
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: (Then let them sleep. But...)
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: (I'm about to leave. I'm dropping the temperature too much. They'll catch a cold.)
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: (Sorry to bother you.)
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: (You didn't. It's just the one with the white hair... he's a light sleeper. If I don't sing to him, he has night terrors. I don't know what he's been through.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: (Time heals all wounds.)
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: (Is your father still working on tomorrow's battle plan? He told me something about an Ursus Infected transport center.)
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: (He has to think carefully, keep our losses low. He always tells me to pay attention to that.)
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: (It's already so late.)
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: (I've never seen him sleep. Not once.)
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: (Heroes need rest too. The other fighters should've taken some.)
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: (Think of yourself before him. Who was that you reached out to a few days ago? Where were they from?)
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: (Lyudmila and Alex. Looks like they've been around Chernobog. They know the city well.)
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: (That's a big city.)
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: (Yes. And with lots of Infected in it. We might be able to bring them in... with the right plan.)
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: (Lyudmila and the people with her seem strong. I think they might become dependable allies, even if they're a little ornery right now.)
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: (Ornery as those of us fighting the Ursus Army all the time?)
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: (Chernobog. It's too far, and too many things stand in our way. How many years would it take? Three or four still wouldn't get us there.)
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: (Even if we don't fight it or stop it... it will have to come to us. With the efforts of the Infected in the city, we can build a city of our own.)
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: (And maybe, in three or four years' time... we'll be looking at tomorrow. Tomorrow is so close.)
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: (I like the sound of that.)
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: (Get some rest.)
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: (Right. Good night.)
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: (Good night, Sasha, and Eno.)
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: (Hurry back. I'll send the kids to the settlement soon.)
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: (Right.)
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: (My brothers and sisters...)
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Good night.
